message: Queenie has renamed the group to 'Weekly Report'
I have decided to resign from the company.
None of the strategies I proposed have been utilised properly.
How are you finding the papers I sent you?
I'm confident that you'll know as much as me once you go through them.
By the way| I recommended you to Mr von Baasch.
You'll be taking my role starting from next week.
I'm sending you a few more papers so you'll be prepared for the job.
